title: The Warrior and the Mischievous Witch
description: MAGIC AND MAYHEM. LURKING EVIL. LUST AND LOVE. Angelica, an impish witch, is nearing her cottage deep in the woods. She senses a presence. A strong male, pure of heart, is lurking just ahead! Taking a breath and closing her eyes she attempts to learn the message he carries, but to her surprise and disappointment she is unable to read him. Waiting for her is Darius Dunworthy, a warrior from the realm of Zanderone. An evil menace is terrifying the citizens, and he has been sent to search out the talented young witch. Though the mighty warrior is able to persuade Angelica to return with him, he quickly learns she is willful, crafty and conniving. She may not be able to read his thoughts, but she can still cast spells. The unlikely duo have an eventful journey, but once they arrive their focus must be the defeat of the evil tormenting the city. Can the warrior's might and Angelic's unique talents save the day? If you enjoy magic mixed with romance, sizzling suspense and the unexpected, this book is for you. Leave the mundane behind! Click the link and escape to Zanderone today.
author: Maggie Carpenter
